name: R4B-NamingSystem-R5-NamingSystem
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B NamingSystem into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem`
R4B `NamingSystem.contact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.contact`
R4B `NamingSystem.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.contained`
R4B `NamingSystem.date` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the naming system

target.display: Natural language description of the naming system
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.description`
R4B `NamingSystem.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NamingSystem.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `NamingSystem.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.implicitRules`

element.display: Intended jurisdiction for naming system (if applicable)

target.display: Intended jurisdiction for naming system (if applicable)
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.jurisdiction`

R4B `NamingSystem.kind` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.kind` - kind has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `NamingSystem.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NamingSystem.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `NamingSystem.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.meta`

R4B `NamingSystem.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NamingSystem.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for this naming system (computer friendly)

target.display: Name for this naming system (computer friendly)
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.name`

element.display: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)

target.display: Name of the publisher/steward (organization or individual)
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.publisher` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.publisher`
R4B `NamingSystem.responsible` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.responsible`

R4B `NamingSystem.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.text`

element.display: e.g. driver,  provider,  patient, bank etc.

target.display: e.g. driver,  provider,  patient, bank etc
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.type` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NamingSystem.type` - type changed the binding strength from Extensible to Preferred
R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId`
R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.comment` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.comment`

R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.period`

element.display: Is this the id that should be used for this type

target.display: Is this the id that should be used for this type
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.preferred` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.preferred`

target.display: oid | uuid | uri | iri-stem | v2csmnemonic | other
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `NamingSystem.uniqueId.value` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.uniqueId.value`
R4B `NamingSystem.usage` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.usage`

element.display: The context that the content is intended to support

target.display: The context that the content is intended to support
target.comment: R4B `NamingSystem.useContext` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NamingSystem.useContext`
